title: Array after two passes of sort - determine result

content.question: Assume that sort is called with the array {6, 3, 2, 5, 4, 1}. Which of the following represents the contents of data after three passes of the outer loop (i.e., when j == 2 at the point indicated by /* End of outer loop */)?

skill.text: 3.B: Determine the result or output based on code that contains data abstractions.
